001package io.github.kale_ko.bjsl.parsers;
002
003import io.github.kale_ko.bjsl.elements.ParsedElement;
004import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
005
006/**
007 * An abstract class that all parsers extend from
008 *
009 * @version 2.1.0
010 * @since 1.0.0
011 */
012public interface Parser {
013    /**
014     * Parse this string into a {@link ParsedElement}
015     *
016     * @param data The string to parse
017     *
018     * @return The string passed parsed to a {@link ParsedElement}
019     *
020     * @throws io.github.kale_ko.bjsl.parsers.exception.ParserException If there is an exception while parsing
021     * @since 1.0.0
022     */
023    public @NotNull ParsedElement toElement(@NotNull String data);
024
025    /**
026     * Parse these bytes into a {@link ParsedElement}
027     *
028     * @param data The bytes to parse
029     *
030     * @return The bytes passed parsed to a {@link ParsedElement}
031     *
032     * @throws io.github.kale_ko.bjsl.parsers.exception.ParserException If there is an exception while parsing
033     * @since 1.0.0
034     */
035    public @NotNull ParsedElement toElement(byte @NotNull [] data);
036
037    /**
038     * Serializes this element into a String
039     *
040     * @param element The element to serialize
041     *
042     * @return The element passed serialized to a String
043     *
044     * @throws io.github.kale_ko.bjsl.parsers.exception.ParserException If there is an exception while parsing
045     * @since 1.0.0
046     */
047    public @NotNull String toString(@NotNull ParsedElement element);
048
049
050    /**
051     * Serializes this element into bytes
052     *
053     * @param element The element to serialize
054     *
055     * @return The element passed serialized to bytes
056     *
057     * @throws io.github.kale_ko.bjsl.parsers.exception.ParserException If there is an exception while parsing
058     * @since 1.0.0
059     */
060    public byte @NotNull [] toBytes(@NotNull ParsedElement element);
061
062    /**
063     * Serializes an empty object element into a string
064     *
065     * @return A string for a new/empty object
066     *
067     * @throws io.github.kale_ko.bjsl.parsers.exception.ParserException If there is an exception while parsing
068     * @since 1.3.0
069     */
070    public @NotNull String emptyString();
071
072    /**
073     * Serializes an empty array element into a string
074     *
075     * @return A string for a new/empty array
076     *
077     * @throws io.github.kale_ko.bjsl.parsers.exception.ParserException If there is an exception while parsing
078     * @since 1.4.0
079     */
080    public @NotNull String emptyArrayString();
081
082    /**
083     * Serializes an empty object element into bytes
084     *
085     * @return The bytes for a new/empty object
086     *
087     * @throws io.github.kale_ko.bjsl.parsers.exception.ParserException If there is an exception while parsing
088     * @since 1.3.0
089     */
090    public byte @NotNull [] emptyBytes();
091
092    /**
093     * Serializes an empty array element into bytes
094     *
095     * @return The bytes for a new/empty array
096     *
097     * @throws io.github.kale_ko.bjsl.parsers.exception.ParserException If there is an exception while parsing
098     * @since 1.4.0
099     */
100    public byte @NotNull [] emptyArrayBytes();
101}
